metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26870 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: Cure53 DOMPurify before 2.0.17 allows mutation XSS. This occurs because aserialize-parse roundtrip does not necessarily return the original DOMtree, and a namespace can change from HTML to MathML, as demonstrated bynesting of FORM elements.

criterions.comment: dompurify.js: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
